description: Table by antidiagonals of number of ways of choosing k items from nk.
references: H. J. Brothers, Pascal's Prism: Supplementary Material, http://www.brotherstechnology.com/docs/Pascal's_Prism_(supplement).pdf.
links: Harry J. Smith, Table of n, a(n) for n=1,...,210
prog: (PARI) { i=0; for (m=1, 20, for (n=1, m, k=m - n + 1; write("b060539.txt", i++, " ", binomial(n*k, k))); ) } [From _Harry J. Smith_, Jul 06 2009]
author: _Henry Bottomley_, Apr 02 2001
